attributes.name: shearModulusTop
attributes.description: Shear modulus at top of soil layer

attributes.name: shearModulusBottom
attributes.description: Shear modulus at bottom of soil layer

attributes.name: effectiveWeightTop
attributes.description: Effective soil weight (gamma) at top of soil layer

attributes.name: effectiveWeightBottom
attributes.description: Effective soil weight (gamma) at bottom of soil layer

attributes.name: undrainedShearStrengthTop
attributes.description: Undrained shear strength (Su) at top of soil layer. Applies for clay only.

attributes.name: undrainedShearStrengthBottom
attributes.description: Undrained shear strength (Su) at bottom of soil layer. Applies for clay only.

attributes.name: relativeDensity
attributes.description: Relative density used for scaling soil curve. Applies for Dunkirk sand only.
